techmeme.title: SandboxAQ, which uses quantum computing to develop AI, raised a $150M Series E extension from Google, Nvidia, and others, taking its total funding to $950M+ (Krystal Hu/Reuters)
The BBC complains to the UK CMA that Apple and Google's news aggregators weaken its relationship with the public by downplaying the BBC branding (Charles Martin/AppleInsider)
Mark Zuckerberg says Meta will share news about a Llama 4 Reasoning model "in the next month" (Cheyenne MacDonald/Engadget)
Microsoft unveils a demo of Quake II generated using its Muse AI model, with limited playability in a browser, as part of the company's Copilot for Gaming push (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Sources: DOGE is hosting a "hackathon" in Washington DC next week to build a "mega API" for accessing all IRS data, with Palantir as a possible partner (Makena Kelly/Wired)
